thread.title: Obama Offered to Let Trump’s Grandkids Have Sasha and Malia’s Playsets, Trump Said No
thread.title_full: Obama Offered to Let Trump’s Grandkids Have Sasha and Malia’s Playsets, Trump Said No

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Obama Offered to Let Trump’s Grandkids Have Sasha and Malia’s Playsets, Trump Said No
text:
Obama Offered to Let Trump’s Grandkids Have Sasha and Malia’s Playsets, Trump Said No by Lindsey Ellefson | 11:43 am, January 6th, 2017 
CBS White House correspondent Mark Knoller noticed something unusual during one of this final trips to 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue while it is still the home of Barack Obama yesterday. 
— Mark Knoller (@markknoller) January 5, 2017 
He realized that the playset that was set up for Obama’s daughters was missing. The playset positioned outside the Oval Office in March 2009 for youngsters Malia and Sasha has been removed. pic.twitter.com/KMFWo8I8Az 
— Mark Knoller (@markknoller) January 5, 2017 
Incoming president Donald Trump declined Obama’s offer to use it for his own grandkids. A WH official says the Obama WH offered to keep the playset for @realDonaldTrump kid/grandkids, but was turned down. pic.twitter.com/zxELtLijUo 
— Mark Knoller (@markknoller) January 5, 2017 
Luckily, some kids in need will benefit from it now. So the WH playset was removed and donated to “a local organization serving those in need,” says WH official. pic.twitter.com/eIJiPft64J 
— Mark Knoller (@markknoller) January 5, 2017 
Trump’s grandkids will likely find something else to play with if they opt to go to the White House at all, which Trump’s young son doesn’t appear to be doing. 
[image: screengrab] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
